name: ABYSM (Joaqstarr)
description:
You are a research bot dropped into a deep sea trench. Explore and escape to the surface.

Notes - 

  • Some buttons do not work, but the game does save, so if you die reopening the game will allow you to continue from your last checkpoint. 
  • Has controller support. Use keys/stick to navigate menu, and LClick/A button/CROSS button to press a menu option.
  • Made for Metroidvania Month 19
